PLACE ORDER

Subscriber Auto Renewal Advantage

Your subscription features our uninterrupted service guarantee and will be automatically renewed unless you tell us to stop. Before the start of each renewal period, you will be sent a reminder notice stating the term and renewal rate then in effect. If you do nothing, you authorize that your credit/debit card will be charged the amount on the notice. You may cancel at any time by contacting customer service at 1-800-811-9834 (U.S.), 1-386-246-3371 (Int'l) and receive a full refund for unserved issues.

Money-Back Guarantee

Contact Us any time to take advantage of our No Questions Asked Money-Back Guarantee.

Delivery Information

New Subscriptions: If the Post Office alerts us that your magazine is undeliverable, we have no further obligation unless we receive a corrected address within one year. All orders are subject to approval. Please allow 4-8 weeks for your first issue to arrive.

Renewals: Renewals orders will be added to your existing subscription to ensure uninterrupted service. Your name and address will be used to automatically identity your existing subscription. If you change your address and the Post Office alerts us that your magazine is undeliverable, we have no further obligation unless we receive a corrected address within one year.

My Address Doesn't Fit

  • Please note that your address must fit in the allotted space due to the size and space limitations of the magazine's mailing label. Longer addresses can be accommodated by abbreviating (e.g., Drive to Dr.)
Close

Money-Back Guarantee

If during your subscription term, or up to one year after the magazine becomes undeliverable or you are ever dissatisfied with your subscription, let us know. You will receive a full refund on all unmailed issues. No questions asked.

You can cancel your subscription at any time by contacting customer service. You will receive a full refund for all unmailed issues remaining in your subscription. Refunds will be issued back to the original form of payment. Please allow one billing cycle for refunds to reflect on your bank or credit card statement.
